basics.title: Web Developer
summary: Front-End Developer with over twenty years of exposure to web technologies and innovations. Prior web development experience on Back-End/Server-Side; strong backgrounds in Computer Science and Information Technology.

Areas of expertise include: single-page AngularJS web application development; platform-agnostic, mobile-first, responsive UI/UX design; and API/web service architectures and communication protocols e.g. AJAX, REST, HTTP, JSON, XML.
Further professional and academic expertise in such fields as: Automotive Engineering, History, Political Science, Clinical Psychology, and Psychopharmacology.
Experienced leader motivated by a passion for learning and continuous self-improvement.

skills.name: AngularJS & Node.js
skills.text: Regular use AngularJS and Node.js for developing JavaScript web applications

skills.name: Bower & npm
skills.text: Preferred package managers for client-side dependencies & development tools

skills.name: Apache & MySQL
skills.text: Experienced with WAMP/LAMP Stack, Apache HTTP Server on EC2, and Relational Databases

skills.name: Gulp.js, Grunt, Yeoman
skills.text: Workflow automation, task-running, and scaffolding development tools

skills.name: CSS3 & Sass/Scss
skills.text: Compiled CSS3 stylesheets and Sass syntax/precompiler language

skills.name: Git & Version Control
skills.text: Regular use of Git and GitHub/BitBucket for version control

skills.name: Python
skills.text: Python web API development with Flask and/or Django
